message:
Such experiments included giving hepatitis to mental patients, gonorrhoea to prisoners, and injecting cancer cells into chronically ill people at a New York hospital.

‎"Pictures have emerged providing the shocking proof that U.S. government doctors once experimented on disabled American citizens & prison inmates. Such experiments included giving hepatitis to mental patients in Connecticut, squirting a pandemic flu virus up the noses of prisoners in Maryland & injecting cancer cells into chronically ill people at a New York hospital..."

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1361275/Americas-shocking-secret-US-experimented-disabled-citizens-prison-inmates.html
